subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jerome Dyson tied a team record with nine steals and A. J. Price scored a career-high 25 points as Connecticut beat St. John’s, 81-65, on Tuesday in the Huskies’ Big East home opener.
snippet: Jerome Dyson tied a team record with nine steals and A. J. Price scored a career-high 25 points as Connecticut beat St. John’s, 81-65, on Tuesday in the Huskies’ Big East home opener.
